item.title: Shelf
item.caption: There's one book missing! Now I remember, I need that book to access the panic room!

item.caption: The book fits perfectly in the gap... Now the door to the panic room is visible. But I still need the combination!

item.title: Statue
item.caption: This is the statue I sent carving for our anniversary. There’s a date written on the foot. “February 16th.” Wasn’t she beautiful...?

item.title: Statue
item.caption: “February 16th.” Now I remember... The date of our anniversary was the combination to open the panic room.
